comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

The people who want to surf the internet just need plug-in to make things easy and convenient. But the plug-in of Firefox is various, there are too many extended plug-in for newcomers, and that might make the newcomers feel complex and hard to use the system. For veteran of browser using, when they reinstall Firefox browser, the installation and settings are all trivial and unbearable.




Expected results:

Some useless plug-in should be given up.
and combine some small plug-in to make it easy to use
